name: OR_CASE_ADTL_RES
description: The OR_CASE_ADTL_RES table contains OR management system case additional resource requests.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the additional resource within the case.

columns.name: ADTL_RES
columns.description: The free text request for additional equipment, instruments, implants, or supplies.
